subject: Golf
Women
British Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Louise Suggs, who helped form the L.P.G.A. in 1950, is grateful to have lived long enough to grace the galleries when the first professional women’s event is held at the Old Course at St. Andrews.
snippet: Louise Suggs, who helped form the L.P.G.A. in 1950, is grateful to have lived long enough to grace the galleries when the first professional women’s event is held at the Old Course at St. Andrews.
